rules.name: commandPlayerAuto
rules.description: 启用 /playerAuto 指令
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPlayerGroup
rules.description: 启用 /playerGroup 指令
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPlayerGroupManage
rules.description: 启用 /playerGroupManage 指令
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPlayerManage
rules.description: 启用 /playerManage 指令
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: fakePlayerCanNotAssimilateExp
rules.description: 判断经验球碰撞实体, 如果为假人则终止碰撞逻辑

rules.name: fakePlayerCanNotPickUpItem
rules.description: 判断掉落物碰撞实体, 如果为假人则终止碰撞逻辑

rules.name: fakePlayerCanNotSurroundExp
rules.description: 判断经验球目标, 如果为假人则终止逻辑 (该操作未同步客户端, 将导致客户端渲染错误)

rules.name: fakePlayerCanWalkOnFluid
rules.description: 判断如果为假人, canWalkOnFluid 将返回 true

rules.name: fakePlayerDropAllExp
rules.description: 假人掉落所有经验并且没有上限

rules.name: fakePlayerDropExpNoUpperLimit
rules.description: 取消假人掉落经验上限, 掉落经验计算依旧与原版一致

rules.name: fakePlayerGameModeLockSurvive
rules.description: 假人将永远为生存模式, 生成假人强制为生存模式

rules.name: fakePlayerImmuneCrammingDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫实体挤压伤害

rules.name: fakePlayerImmuneDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫所有伤害

rules.name: fakePlayerImmuneExplosionDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫爆炸伤害

rules.name: fakePlayerImmuneInFireDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫碰到火焰伤害

rules.name: fakePlayerImmuneLavaDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫碰到岩浆伤害

rules.name: fakePlayerImmuneOnFireDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫着火后的后续持续伤害

rules.name: fakePlayerImmunePlayerDamage
rules.description: 假人免疫来自玩家的伤害, 防止手贱

rules.name: fakePlayerKeepInventory
rules.description: 判断如果为假人, 不掉落库存

rules.name: fakePlayerNotBeCaughtInPowderSnow
rules.description: 判断如果为假人, canWalkOnPowderSnow 将返回 true

rules.name: fakePlayerNotDie
rules.description: 假人锁血

rules.name: fakePlayerNotHunger
rules.description: 判断如果为假人, 将 foodTickTimer 设置为 0

rules.name: fakePlayerNotHypoxic
rules.description: 判断如果为假人, canBreatheInWater 将返回 true

rules.name: fakePlayerWillNotAffectedByBubbleColumn
rules.description: 判断如果为假人, 终止气泡柱碰撞逻辑

rules.name: groupCanBePlayerLogInSpawn
rules.description: 如果应在组里假人已经存在时依旧生成组

rules.name: hiddenFakePlayerGroupJoinMessage
rules.description: 防止登录大量假人造成刷屏, 但单独登录以假人组名创建的假人登录消息也会隐藏
